main event: Observers watch a reddish orange fuzzy object travel toward the east at 10 PM on April 22, 1967.
interesting points: The object was confirmed to be a balloon traveling through the sky., The object glowed and was reddish orange in color., No sound was noted during the sighting., The size of the object was estimated to be approximately 2.5-3.0 degrees., The object appeared to spiral up while spinning before disappearing from view.
